## Classic Solitaire (Free) for Windows 10

If you are a fan of playing card games on your computer, then you must have heard of Classic Solitaire. It is one of the most popular computer card games in the world, and now it is available for free on Windows 10. The best part? The game comes pre-installed on Windows 10 so you do not have to download or install anything. In this article, we will take a look at all the features of Classic Solitaire and how to play it.

### Features

Classic Solitaire for Windows 10 has the same interface as the original game that was first introduced in 1990. The game has a simple layout with easy-to-use controls. The game also has a new Daily Challenge mode that provides a unique game every day. Suitable for all ages, this game will keep you occupied for hours.

### How to play

The goal of Classic Solitaire is to move all the cards to four foundation piles, stacked by suit and in ascending order from Ace to King. To move the cards, you must alternate between red and black, and arrange the cards in descending order. At the start of the game, you will have seven columns of cards, with the first column having one card, the second two, and so on. The last card in each column is turned face-up.

You can move the cards to different columns or the foundation piles. If you get stuck, you can use the undo button to go back or the hint button to get a suggestion.

### Conclusion

Classic Solitaire is a timeless game that provides hours of entertainment to all generations. The game's simple interface and easy-to-use controls make it a favorite amongst many. With pre-installed availability on Windows 10, you can play it without hassles. So why not give it a try? You never know how much fun you might have.
